The shooting rampage has prompted`` a lot of reflection'' among lawmakers about the tone of political debate. I'd like to see the president use his bully pulpit to bring us back to the recognition that we can have hard-fought battles and disagree on policy, but at the end of the day we have to make progress, Welch said.
